text: I've had my detective agency set up for a week, yet no clients have come to me with a case.
No murders, no disappearances, not even a missing item. If I didn't know any better, I'd say this world exists free of conflict.
speaker: det

text: But I'm no idiot. Conflict is just human nature-
it's something that exists between the conflicting ideals of different parties; it's inevitable.
speaker: det

text: Sooner or later, some poor bloke is gonna walk in with some problem: a case for me and me alone.
And when the crime starts knocking, I'll be there.
speaker: det

text: I'm no stranger to hostile environments though. Folks tend to be untrusting of strangers that lurk in the dark.
I'll show them my credentials up front
so they know that I'm the best.
I just need to grab my business card.
speaker: det
